projects.title: Fair Compensation
projects.bodyText:
- A showcase for calculating fair salary with machine learning
 - Data versioning and training pipeline with DVC
 - CI/CD pipeline with automatic test execution and model deployment
 - Frontend with React and backend with FastAPI

projects.title: Medical Image Segmentation
projects.bodyText:
- A simulation framework for benchmarking active learning strategies for 3D medical image segmentation
 - Fully reproducible experiments: seeded random processes and only deterministic operations
 - Weights & Biases integration
